We’ve seen discounts go lower in the past to $100 and a one-time $90 low from July’s Prime Day event, but you’re still looking at a solid 26% markdown here that cuts $36 off the going rate to land it at the third-best price we have tracked.

more…

items.title: Apple says Live Translation on AirPods will expand to the EU next month; the first iOS 26.2 beta, seeded to developers on Tuesday, brings the feature to the EU (Joe Rossignol/MacRumors)
items.summary:
Joe Rossignol / MacRumors:
Apple says Live Translation on AirPods will expand to the EU next month; the first iOS 26.2 beta, seeded to developers on Tuesday, brings the feature to the EU  —  The upcoming iOS 26.2 update for iPhone makes the Live Translation on AirPods feature available in the EU, according to Apple.

items.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
items.summary: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across multiple websites to find real-time ticket options that meet your specific requests.

items.title: Fanttik A10 Pro packs a laser and mechanical tape measure into one device for $70 (Save $50)
items.summary:
Fanttik A10 Pro 2-in-1 Digital/Physical Laser Tape Measure

Buy for $70 (Reg. $120)

What we love

You’ve seen mechanical tape measures and you’ve seen laser distance devices, but have you seen an all-in-one before? This device packs both pieces of tech into one device so you can capture up to 165-foot measurements via laser and 9.8-feet using the tape.

netzpolitik.org:

Most of the standing desks we come across are about 24 inches deep, but this model steps that up to 28 inches. This notable change can certainly help when you have a large display and don’t want to be right up against it.

items.title: This desk pad packs two Qi charging zones, a smartphone stand, and RGB for $30 (Reg. $60)
items.summary:
Miroddi Desk Pad with Dual Qi Charging and Stand

Buy for $30 (Reg. $60)

What we love

This feature-packed desk pad spans 31.5 by 15.7 inches and boasts not one, but two Qi charging pads. One is for AirPods or a pair of Qi-compatible earbuds while the other is for a smartphone. I like that the smartphone portion can lay flat or prop up your device so you can stay on top of notifications.

items.title: Anker’s new compact USB-C charger with retractable cable is down to just $26 today (All-time low)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its latest 35W Nano USB-C charger for $25.99 with free shipping with Prime members or in orders over $35. This charger hit the scene a couple of months back carrying a $40 price tag as part of the brand’s Nano series. It didn’t see a discount during the recent fall Prime Day sale unlike the other new models in the lineup, and it’s now seeing its first deal at 35% off. Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking a best price to beat. You can get this charger in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $26 low today. Head below for more details.

items.title: Phone location data of top EU officials for sale, report finds
items.summary: Journalists in Europe found it was "easy" to spy on top European Union officials using commercially obtained location data sold by data brokers, despite the continent having some of the strongest data protection laws in the world.

items.title: Anthropic projects $70B in revenue by 2028: Report
items.summary: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028. The growth projections are fueled by rapid adoption of Anthropic’s business products, a person with knowledge of the company’s financials said.
